channel.title: When players connect my net shuts off?
channel.description: everytime i try to host my server for a friend to connect (been testing it for a while) we have tryd several times and everytime he connects he logs in for a split seccond then it disconnects my net? i have my firewall shut off in my router and computer and set up a static ip and all that good stuff PLEASE help i cannont find out why this is happening
